db.query: CREATE TABLE barcodes ( _id VARCHAR PRIMARY KEY, user_id VARCHAR NOT NULL, code TEXT NOT NULL, name TEXT DEFAULT NULL, latitude NUMBER DEFAULT NULL, longitude NUMBER DEFAULT NULL, accuracy NUMBER DEFAULT NULL, timestamp DATETIME DEFAULT NULL, score NUMBER DEFAULT 0 )
INSERT INTO barcodes (_id, user_id, code, name, latitude, longitude, accuracy, timestamp, score) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
INSERT INTO barcodes (_id, user_id, code, name) VALUES (?,?,?,?)
SELECT * FROM barcodes WHERE user_id = ? ORDER BY _id DESC
